Thanks for your prompt attention onward the transaction ,I'm very glad that you should your interesting this project ,how are you and your family hope you are dwelling in the shadow of the Almighty God with your family ?

I carefully contact you due to many Internet frauds nowadays.but i put my faith in God because all things in life is by risk but that does not mean you should let me down due to my trust in you, Mr.Plavia shakunthala Lobo was my client  and him and his family was involved in plan crash that was happened on 22nd of May 2010 and there names was show in the List of passengers on Air India Express flight that crashed  32.Plaviashakunthala Lobo 33. Venishanikola Lobo 34. Vishalfloid Lobo (child) and all family died without any inheritance or next of kin so for the benefit i decided to contact you by work together with me and get this done as the attorney to  Mr.Plaviashakunthala Lobo account details.
I was the only person with Mr.Plaviashakunthala Lobo as his legal witness when this money was deposited as fixed deposit in 2009. Since his demise, I have visited this bank more than 10 times. Contact the bank and ask for the confirmation of his involvement in the plane crash.check the website:  http://ravoof.com/horrible-plane-crash-in-mangalore-airport-ai-express-flight-from-dubai/
Regarding to the all necessary document will be handle by me but you will be the one contact the bank direct and and if there any cost in the bank you will take of it but i knew that all the charges has been paid when we make the deposit.
N.B you need to provide the information requested from you .
Thanks
Papchua
